channel.title: Changing texturesize?
channel.description:
I'm trying to add new textures with Toms Cache Suite, but obviously there's a restriction on the size of your file. Original texture was around 5kb New one is 12kb,
When I add the new one, my game freezes, when i resize my new texture till its around 5kb, then it works but then my texture is fucked up.
[b]Is there a way to change the size restriction, or a good method to crop the size of my texture without resizing? [/b] thanks in advance

item.title: Changing texturesize?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I’m trying to add new textures with Toms Cache Suite,
but obviously there’s a restriction on the size of your file.
Original texture was around 5kb
New one is 12kb,

When I add the new one, my game freezes, when i resize my new texture till its around 5kb, then it works but then my texture is fucked up.

Is there a way to change the size restriction, or a good method to crop the size of my texture without resizing?
thanks in advance
